IHM_MAIN.src

Class IHMLobbyAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • IHM_MAIN.src.IHMLobbyAPI

  • public class IHMLobbyAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    IHMLobbyAPI is the API used by Data to display tables or profiles after a request

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IHMLobbyAPI.IncompleteProfileException 

    • Constructor Summary

      void displayProfile(Profile profil, javafx.stage.Window parent)
      IHMLobbyAPI#displayProfile allows the opening of a profile window, and takes a Profile and a parent Window.
      void displayTable(InterImplDataTable inter, User user)
      IHMLobbyAPI#displayTable allows the opening of a table window, and takes a Table implementation and a User.
      void setWindowToDestroy(javafx.stage.Stage target)
      IHMLobbyAPI#setWindowToDestroy sets the next window to kill when displaying a table.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IHMLobbyAPI

        public IHMLobbyAPI()

    • Method Detail

      • displayProfile

        public void displayProfile(Profile profil,
                           javafx.stage.Window parent)
                    throws IHMLobbyAPI.IncompleteProfileException
        IHMLobbyAPI#displayProfile allows the opening of a profile window, and takes a Profile and a parent Window.
        This method is to be used by Data after a profile request.
        Parameters:
        profil - A Profile object, containing the profile to be displayed.
        parent - The parent Window, used to give the profile window a parent to attach to.
        Throws:
        IHMLobbyAPI.IncompleteProfileException
        See Also:
        Profile, Window

      • displayTable

        public void displayTable(InterImplDataTable inter,
                         User user)
        IHMLobbyAPI#displayTable allows the opening of a table window, and takes a Table implementation and a User.
        This method is to be used by Data after a table request.
        Parameters:
        inter - An InterImplDataTable object, containing the table data to be displayed.
        user - The User object used to display the table to.
        See Also:
        InterImplDataTable, User

      • setWindowToDestroy

        public void setWindowToDestroy(javafx.stage.Stage target)
        IHMLobbyAPI#setWindowToDestroy sets the next window to kill when displaying a table.
        This method is only to be used when killing the window that requested the table.
        Parameters:
        target - A Stage object, containing the window to be destroyed.
        See Also:
        Stage
